title: Fix Ready tab summary cards to display correct deduplicated order metrics

requirements.summary: Fix the summary cards to display the correct count and metrics for orders shown in the Ready tab, ensuring the summary values match the deduplicated order list
acceptanceCriteria: Summary card values in the Ready tab accurately reflect the deduplicated order count
Total weight and quantity metrics match the orders displayed in the Ready tab table
Summary calculations account for the same deduplication logic used in ReadyTab.tsx

file_operations.description: Update the component to pass the deduplicated orders array to SummaryCards instead of the raw filtered orders. Ensure the deduplication logic (using orderId) is applied before passing orders to both the OrderTable and SummaryCards components, so that summary metrics accurately reflect the displayed orders.

Update the SummaryCards component to accept an optional pre-filtered orders array prop when rendering in the Ready tab context. When this prop is provided, use it directly for calculations instead of filtering from allOrders. This ensures summary calculations use the same deduplicated order set that is displayed in the table.
